summary.span: 发现参数的属性并提供对参数元数据的访问权限。

span.span: Discovers the attributes of a parameter and provides access to parameter metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的实例 `ParameterInfo` 获取有关参数的数据类型、默认值等的信息。Use an instance of `ParameterInfo` to obtain information about the parameter's data type, default value, and so on. `ParameterInfo`按顺序返回对象的数组，这些对象表示方法的参数。 returns an array of `ParameterInfo` objects representing the parameters of a method, in order. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用各种反射类来分析包含在程序集中的元数据。This example shows how to use various reflection classes to analyze the metadata contained in an assembly. [!code-cpp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CPP/reflection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CS/Reflection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/VB/Reflection.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

summary.span: 获取此参数的属性。

span.span: Gets the attributes for this parameter.

value.span: 表示该参数的特性的 对象。

span.span: A object representing the attributes for this parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法利用 方法。This method utilizes the method. 若要获取 数组，请先获取方法或构造函数，然后调用 。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call . ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有三个参数的方法。The following example defines a method with three parameters. 它使用 属性获取第二个参数的属性，并在控制台上显示它们。It uses the property to get the attributes of the second parameter and display them at the console. [!code-cpp[ParameterInfo_Attributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_Attributes1/CPP/parameterinfo_attributes1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ParameterInfo_Attributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_Attributes1/CS/parameterinfo_attributes1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParameterInfo_Attributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_Attributes1/VB/parameterinfo_attributes1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 参数的属性。

span.span: The attributes of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段仅适用于从派生类的用户 `ParameterInfo` 。This field is intended only for users who are deriving classes from `ParameterInfo`. 对参数特性的典型访问通过 。Typical access to parameter attributes is through .

summary.span: 参数的 。

span.span: The of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段仅适用于从派生类的用户 `ParameterInfo` 。This field is intended only for users who are deriving classes from `ParameterInfo`. 对参数类型的典型访问通过 。Typical access to parameter types is through .

summary.span: 获取一个指示默认值的值（如果参数具有默认值）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the default value if the parameter has a default value.

value.span: 参数的默认值，或 （如果参数没有默认值）。

span.span: The default value of the parameter, or if the parameter has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅用于执行上下文中。This property is used only in the execution context. 在仅反射上下文中，改用 属性。In the reflection-only context, use the property instead. 当未在方法调用中指定实际值时，将使用默认值。The default value is used when an actual value is not specified in the method call. 参数的默认值可以为 `null` 。A parameter can have a default value that is `null`. 这不同于未定义默认值的情况。This is distinct from the case where a default value is not defined. 此方法利用 方法。This method utilizes the method. 若要获取 数组，请先获取方法或构造函数，然后调用 。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call .

summary.span: 参数的默认值。

span.span: The default value of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段仅适用于从派生类的用户 `ParameterInfo` 。This field is intended only for users who are deriving classes from `ParameterInfo`. 对参数的默认值的典型访问通过 。Typical access to the default value of the parameter is through .

summary.span: 获取应用于此参数的自定义属性。

span.span: Gets the custom attributes applied to this parameter.

param.name: inherit
param.span: 对于该类型的对象，将忽略此自变量。

span.span: This argument is ignored for objects of this type.

summary.span: 获取此参数上定义的所有自定义属性。

span.span: Gets all the custom attributes defined on this parameter.

returns.span: 包含应用于此参数的所有自定义属性的数组。

span.span: An array that contains all the custom attributes applied to this parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将忽略 `inherit` 参数。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter. 若要在继承链中搜索参数上的属性，请使用方法的适当重载 。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on parameters, use the appropriate overloads of the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在运行时检索应用于方法参数的自定义特性。The following example shows how custom attributes that have been applied to the parameters of methods can be retrieved at run time. 该示例定义了一个 `MyAttribute` 可应用于参数的名为的自定义属性。The example defines a custom attribute named `MyAttribute` that can be applied to parameters. 然后，该示例使用名为的方法定义一个名为的类 `MyClass` `MyMethod` ，并将其应用于 `MyAttribute` 该方法的参数。The example then defines a class named `MyClass` with a method named `MyMethod`, and applies `MyAttribute` to a parameter of the method. 运行该示例时，它使用 方法来检索已应用于中所有方法的所有参数的自定义属性 `MyClass` ，并将其显示在控制台上。When the example is run, it uses the method to retrieve the custom attributes that have been applied to all parameters of all methods in `MyClass`, and displays them at the console. [!code-cpp[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttributes/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 无法加载自定义属性类型。

span.span: A custom attribute type could not be loaded.

summary.span: 返回当前参数的 对象列表，这些对象可以在仅反射上下文中使用。

span.span: Returns a list of objects for the current parameter, which can be used in the reflection-only context.

returns.span: 对象的泛型列表，表示有关已应用于当前参数的特性的数据。

span.span: A generic list of objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the current parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果自定义属性本身是在加载到仅反射上下文中的代码中定义的，则使用此方法在仅反射上下文中检查代码的自定义属性。Use this method to examine the custom attributes of code in the reflection-only context, in cases where the custom attributes themselves are defined in code that is loaded into the reflection-only context. 此 类情况下不能使用和等方法，因为它们会创建属性的实例。Methods such as and cannot be used in such cases, because they create instances of the attributes. 仅反射上下文中的代码无法执行。Code in the reflection-only context cannot be executed. 有关详细信息和示例代码，请参阅 类。For more information and example code, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为托管编译器的设计器提供和方法。The and methods are provided for designers of managed compilers. 有关自定义修饰符的详细信息，请参阅 和命名空间中的相关类 和 ECMA Partition II 文档中的元数据规范。For more information on custom modifiers, see and related classes in the namespace, and the metadata specification in the ECMA Partition II documentation. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将忽略 `inherit` 参数。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter. 若要在继承链中搜索参数上的属性，请使用方法的适当重载 。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on parameters, use the appropriate overloads of the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了两个自定义特性： `MyAttribute` 和 `MyDerivedAttribute` 。The following example defines two custom attributes, `MyAttribute` and `MyDerivedAttribute`. `MyDerivedAttribute` 派生自 `MyAttribute`。`MyDerivedAttribute` is derived from `MyAttribute`. 然后，该示例将这些特性应用于示例类的方法的参数。The example then applies these attributes to the parameters of a method of an example class. 运行该示例时，它使用 方法来测试示例类中所有方法的所有参数。When the example is run, it uses the method to test all parameters of all methods in the example class. 然后，它显示具有或的 `MyAttribute` 参数 `MyDerivedAttribute` 。It then displays the parameters that have `MyAttribute` or `MyDerivedAttribute`. [!code-cpp[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/CPP/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/CS/parameterinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/VB/parameterinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsIn As Boolean
public: property bool IsIn { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，通过该值指示这是否为输入参数。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this is an input parameter.

value.span: 如果此参数是输入参数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the parameter is an input parameter; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法依赖于可选的元数据标志。This method depends on an optional metadata flag. 编译器可以插入此标志，但编译器无义务执行此操作。This flag can be inserted by compilers, but the compilers are not obligated to do so. 此方法使用 `In` 枚举器的标志 `ParameterAttributes` 。This method utilizes the `In` flag of the `ParameterAttributes` enumerator. 若要获取 数组，请先获取方法或构造函数，然后调用 。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试 、和特性的方法参数 。The following example shows how to test method parameters for the , , and attributes. 该示例包含一个 `DefineMethod` 方法，该方法可执行以下操作：The example contains a `DefineMethod` method that does the following: - 创建包含类型的动态程序集 `MyType` 。Creates a dynamic assembly containing a `MyType` type. - 向添加 `MyMethod` 方法 `MyType` 。Adds a `MyMethod` method to `MyType`. `MyMethod` 有三个参数。`MyMethod` has three parameters. 第一个参数是用定义的 ，第二个参数具有 和第三个参数 。The first parameter is defined with , the second with , and the third with . - 调用 以完成类型。Calls to complete the type. 执行后 `DefineMethod` ，此示例将搜索当前加载的程序集，直到它找到动态程序集。After executing `DefineMethod`, the example searches the assemblies that are currently loaded until it finds the dynamic assembly. 它 `MyType` 从程序集加载，获取 方法的对象 `MyMethod` 并检查参数。It loads `MyType` from the assembly, gets a object for the `MyMethod` method, and examines the parameters. 该示例使用 、 和 属性来显示有关参数的信息。The example uses the , , and properties to display information about the parameters. [!code-cpp[ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional/CPP/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional/CS/parameterinfo_isin_isout_isoptional.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional/VB/parameterinfo_isin_isout_isoptional.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法依赖于可选的元数据标志。This method depends on an optional metadata flag. 编译器可以插入此标志，但编译器无义务执行此操作。This flag can be inserted by compilers, but the compilers are not obligated to do so. 此方法使用 `Optional` 枚举器的标志 `ParameterAttributes` 。This method utilizes the `Optional` flag of the `ParameterAttributes` enumerator. 若要获取 数组，请先获取方法，然后调用 。To get the array, first get the method and then call . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试 、和特性的方法参数 。The following example shows how to test method parameters for the , , and attributes. 该示例包含一个 `DefineMethod` 方法，该方法可执行以下操作：The example contains a `DefineMethod` method that does the following: - 创建包含类型的动态程序集 `MyType` 。Creates a dynamic assembly containing a `MyType` type. - 向添加 `MyMethod` 方法 `MyType` 。Adds a `MyMethod` method to `MyType`. `MyMethod` 有三个参数。`MyMethod` has three parameters. 第一个参数是用定义的 ，第二个参数具有 和第三个参数 。The first parameter is defined with , the second with , and the third with . - 调用 以完成类型。Calls to complete the type. 执行后 `DefineMethod` ，此示例将搜索当前加载的程序集，直到它找到动态程序集。After executing `DefineMethod`, the example searches the assemblies that are currently loaded until it finds the dynamic assembly. 它 `MyType` 从程序集加载，获取 方法的对象 `MyMethod` 并检查参数。It loads `MyType` from the assembly, gets a object for the `MyMethod` method, and examines the parameters. 该示例使用 、 和 属性来显示有关参数的信息。The example uses the , , and properties to display information about the parameters. [!code-cpp[ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional/CPP/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional/CS/parameterinfo_isin_isout_isoptional.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ParameterInfo_IsIn_IsOut_IsOptional/VB/parameterinfo_isin_isout_isoptional.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法依赖于可选的元数据标志。This method depends on an optional metadata flag. 编译器可以插入此标志，但编译器无义务执行此操作。This flag can be inserted by compilers, but the compilers are not obligated to do so. 此方法使用 `Out` 枚举器的标志 `ParameterAttributes` 。This method utilizes the `Out` flag of the `ParameterAttributes` enumerator. 若要获取 数组，请先获取方法或构造函数，然后调用 。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试 、和特性的方法参数 。The following example shows how to test method parameters for the , , and attributes. 该示例包含一个 `DefineMethod` 方法，该方法可执行以下操作：The example contains a `DefineMethod` method that does the following: - 创建包含类型的动态程序集 `MyType` 。Creates a dynamic assembly containing a `MyType` type. - 向添加 `MyMethod` 方法 `MyType` 。Adds a `MyMethod` method to `MyType`. `MyMethod` 有三个参数。`MyMethod` has three parameters. 第一个参数是用定义的 ，第二个参数具有 和第三个参数 。The first parameter is defined with , the second with , and the third with . - 调用 以完成类型。Calls to complete the type. 执行后 `DefineMethod` ，此示例将搜索当前加载的程序集，直到它找到动态程序集。After executing `DefineMethod`, the example searches the assemblies that are currently loaded until it finds the dynamic assembly. 它 `MyType` 从程序集加载，获取 方法的对象 `MyMethod` 并检查参数。It loads `MyType` from the assembly, gets a object for the `MyMethod` method, and examines the parameters. 该示例使用 、 和 属性来显示有关参数的信息。The example uses the , , and properties to display information about the parameters. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性利用受保护的 字段，并且依赖于可能在所有编译器中都不可用的可选元数据标志。This property utilizes the protected field, and depends on an optional metadata flag that might not be available in all compilers. 若要获取 数组，请先获取方法或构造函数，然后调用 方法。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call the method. > [!WARNING] > 如果此 表示返回值 (即，如果它是通过使用属性) 获取的，则 此属性将为 `null` 。If this represents a return value (that is, if it was obtained by using the property), this property will be `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 方法的参数的对象，然后使用 属性获取参数名称。The following example shows how to get objects for the parameters of a method, and then use the property to obtain the parameter names. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在计算位置时，只考虑方法签名中的参数 (即形参表中的形参) 。Only parameters in the method signature (that is, in the formal parameter list) are considered when calculating the position. 对于实例方法， `this` `Me` 不计算表示 Visual Basic) 中 (的隐藏参数。For instance methods, the hidden parameter that represents `this` (`Me` in Visual Basic) is not counted. 此方法利用 方法。This method utilizes the method. 若要获取 数组，请先获取方法或构造函数，然后调用 。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可在执行上下文和仅反射上下文中使用。This property can be used in both the execution context and the reflection-only context. 当未在方法调用中指定实际值时，将使用默认值。The default value is used when an actual value is not specified in the method call. 参数的默认值可以为 `null` 。A parameter can have a default value that is `null`. 这不同于未定义默认值的情况。This is distinct from the case where a default value is not defined. 若要获取 数组，请先获取方法或构造函数，然后调用 方法。To get the array, first get the method or the constructor and then call the method.

param.name: pExcepInfo

span.span: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.

param.name: puArgErr
param.span: 第一个出错参数的索引。

span.span: The index of the first argument that has an error.

summary.span: 提供对某一对象公开的属性和方法的访问。

span.span: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于从非托管代码访问托管类，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [IDispatch：： Invoke](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nf-oaidl-idispatch-invoke)。For more information, see [IDispatch::Invoke](/windows/win32/api/oaidl/nf-oaidl-idispatch-invoke).

exception.span: 不支持使用 COM IDispatch 接口的后期绑定访问。

span.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 获取表示为字符串的参数类型和名称。

span.span: Gets the parameter type and name represented as a string.

returns.span: 包含参数的类型和名称的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the type and the name of the parameter.
